text: Ani jya lokanni va'ita karma kele, tyanna tyancya duskarmanci siksa samana1 milela ani tyancyavara apamana acchadita ho'ila, tyanna allahapasuna konihi vacavu sakanara nahi, tyancya tondavara janu kahi andharya ratrice thara gundalale gele asatila. He loka narakata rahanare aheta, te sadaiva tethe rahatila
